mapper.insert: insert into DB_SYS_ERRLOG (LOG_DTM, LOG_SEQ, ERR_EQUIP, ERR_EQ_NO, ERR_CODE, ERR_MSG, ERR_POS, ERR_STON, JOB_NO, LOCT, PLT, PLT_ID, REMARKS, REG_USER_ID) values (#{logDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{logSeq,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{errEquip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errEqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errSton,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pltId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update DB_SYS_ERRLOG set ERR_EQUIP = #{errEquip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERR_EQ_NO = #{errEqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERR_CODE = #{errCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERR_MSG = #{errMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERR_POS = #{errPos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERR_STON = #{errSton,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOB_NO = #{jobNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCT = #{loct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLT = #{plt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLT_ID = #{pltId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_USER_ID = #{regUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where LOG_DTM = #{logDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and LOG_SEQ = #{logSeq,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select: select LOG_DTM, LOG_SEQ, ERR_EQUIP, ERR_EQ_NO, ERR_CODE, ERR_MSG, ERR_POS, ERR_STON, JOB_NO, LOCT, PLT, PLT_ID, REMARKS, REG_USER_ID from DB_SYS_ERRLOG
